Pre-release '''1.4.5''' is the first and only pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.4.5]], released on November 16, 2012.<ref name=pre>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2012/11/minecraft-1-4-5-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2012/11/minecraft-1-4-5-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.4.5 Pre-release|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=November 16, 2012}}</ref>

This pre-release was reuploaded on November 19 to fix {{bug|MC-2497}},<ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|270471030240313345|The Minecraft 1.4.5 snapshot has been updated by Mojang. MCP needs to be updated to support the new version. I'll stream it in 8-9 hours.|19 Nov 12}}</ref> and this reupload proceeded to become the full release of 1.4.5.

== Fixes ==
'''11 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed missing localization in editing signs UI.
* Fixed worn [[head]]s clipping through hat layer.
* Fixed [[dispenser]]s firing towards one side.
* Fixed [[wolves]] shaking fur dry while dying.
* Fixed weird random flames from [[torch]]es and spawners.
* Fixed spawning baby wolves from wild ones.
* Fixed spawning baby [[villager]]s creating farmer baby villagers only.
* Fixed IPv6 servers crashing the client.
* Fixed the last page of {{cmd|/help}} missing.
* Fixed players not being able to join to LAN worlds.
* Fixed entities teleporting to and from origin in multiplayer.</onlyinclude>
